0.6.name: wordpress/currex
0.6.description: curreX is an AJAX powered Currency Conversion widget which can be run in your WordPress sidebar(s). The widget is very simple and does exactly what it's supposed to do. It accepts a currency value (integer or decimal) and a source & destination currency and gives you the converted rate once you hit the Convert button.
